author: kaletsop
title: DAOLaunch: Decentralized VC NFTs
description: L'industrie de l'investissement dans les startups est largement dirigée par les grands investisseurs institutionnels et les investisseurs particuliers sont laissés à l'écart des grandes opportunités d'investissement.

f6_assessments.q0: This is an extraordinary proposal. Not only it has a clear understanding of the challenge and its goals, but it solves its main question splendidly. The source of the problem of the challenge is isolated and clearly identified, it is the lack of auditability of some facts that are used to distort information and create fake news and scams. The solution proposed addresses this problem in a brilliant way and with an unbelievable solidity. They explain that by building Factpage not only they are creating a repository of media using verified audit trails, but they are also classifying them in terms of different qualities effectively creating a taxonomy, which in turn will add value to the Cardano ecosystem because truth about Cardano and ongoing and past events will be much easier to be established even for beginners. The key metrics used are highly aligned with the outlined challenge settings. For instance, enhancement of transparency and the construction of a repository of scam attempts are some of them. Finally, they have discussed as well, paths to achieve scalability in the future by means of reliably automating different tools that will be used, which will turn the solution to a decentralized model.
f6_assessments.q1: A lot of evidence of relevant skills and experience was given to support the naming of Peter Van Garderen and Dr. Hossain Maserrat to the project. The proposal describes their professional past as well as provide LinkedIn links to further explore their professional career. Also, they have estimated the type and number (just two) of team members required for the project. Moreover, the budget is well explained, broken down into identifiable items that are granular enough and the total amount asked for is reasonable. The timetable is realistic and takes into account that only the first 3 months will be sponsored by the fund resources. They are very clear in describing how each phase will develop what they have proposed. For example, they explain how they intend to construct a proof-of-fact explorer and how they intend to escalate in the future, making everything they can automated.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap traced is over the top. It has enough milestones and they all are relevant. Plus, the time horizon is pretty reasonable. Besides that, the metrics defined are strongly aligned with the goals of the challenge. For example, they set making truth easier to be established even for newcomers and transperancy being enhanced two metrics to be pursued. However, more quantifiable KPIs could have been defined such as number of scam attempts in the repository or amount of information regarding Cardano treasury. Finally, the solution is understandable and addresses the problem if it succeeds.

f6_assessments.q0:
i strogly agree because the proposal is in scope with the challenge and has a nice solution for it by!
1. creating an open and inclusive competitive environment will help  the Decentralized Venture Capital concept, by maintaining a balance between big institutional investors and retail investors.

2. creating of tokens for their tokensale. It's an easy and simple step with no coding knowledge required and it will also help both institutional investers and retaile investors. And this has a possitive impact on the cardano ecosystem by Boosting DeFi.

3.DAOLaunch vision is also to change the structure of shady behind-closed-door investment deals to an open and more competitive deal structure that takes place on the blockchain. This will drastically shake up the startup industry.
f6_assessments.q1:
i strogly agree bacause key metrics and the goals, evidences, and good links with active emails with vedios are provided for soo many enquiries.
 And also looking at the solutions by allowing Investors be able to check exit information such as "Listing Date/Listing Price/Liquidity '' before investing A project must detail its Hard Cap and Soft Cap.
In a nutshell  the introduction  of VC's on bored to make the proposal a success is also a good thing, budgets are outlined correctly and brocken down into identifierble items
f6_assessments.q2:
i strogly agree due to!
1. providing of links to their emails vedios and correct road maps shows how clearly the propsal will function if funded.
2. there are also clearly define metrics and KPI's that defines the success of this proposal looking at the team structure. 
3. the proposal has a clear understanderble solution solving the problem that is  to create an open and inclusive competitive environment.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal makes fantastic use of NFTs on cardano, and presents the very groundbreaking idea of using NFTs as ownership in a DAO that governs a decentralized VC. This proposal very effectively addresses the challenge and elevates NFTs from collector items to ownership in a decentralised VC
f6_assessments.q1:
Given the team is already operating on BSc and ethereum combined with the teams experience and partnerships. 

The team is already operating AMM Liquidity pools and working with VCs, it is clear to me that this team is ambitious and competent.

I think that given that, is very likely that this proposal is highly successful.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal includes a detailed roadmap with sensible milestones that are auditable and make sense in the context of the roadmap as presented.

I would like to see a little more specifics with regards to the milestones, some specific KPIs would be great here, other than that I believe this roadmap is attainable and realistic.

f6_assessments.q0:
The detailed explanation about the problem inside the proposal and their way to solve it that is definitely will bring a big change to the investment industry to start-ups. I believe that it will have an amazing effect like the helping of Catalyst communities to ideas today. Therefore, It will make a strong impact on Cardano ecosystem in the future. 
But one thing I need to know is their key metric of success, this will help to realize what they will prioritize to get and if that fits with our challenge setting or not. For this project, I think it should be some metrics about investors, business ideas... will happy to join their system.
f6_assessments.q1:
This project is on the way go, it is not just on paper and the proposer also attaches a lot of referrals and documents that can help us to well understand and assess it. Moreover, with the detailed explanation of this project in the proposal, I think the proposer provides a realistic roadmap and I believe it can be done well by their team. 
But the special thing is their required budget of $80k will be all used for liquidity. So, in this case, I do want to know more detail about the implementation plan that this project will make this $80 more meaningful, they're maybe activities surrounding this liquidity on the time they will be used.
f6_assessments.q2:
The project is running and the proposer provides a detailed roadmap with the timeline that suits the ability of its development team. 
But my advice is that the proposer should show some key metrics that will invest resources on to accomplish, and explain more about activities that will do or optimize with the required budget. 
About the problem and solution explanation, the proposal absolutely clear and can help us to understand what the team has done and will do, but it's still not enough to help us assess the feasibility in the scope of work of the required budget.

f6_assessments.q0:
This might be a bit tricky because the proposal has a lot of elements that tick the right boxes. The only box it didn't tick is where the proposal was submmited. I think this will be more suited for the DAO challenge. 

However, there are elements of expanding Cardano's DeFi ecosystem. Interoperability at Cardano is one of the major goals. Having a proposal that addresses this type of expansion will increase the adoption we need as a blockchain network.
f6_assessments.q1: Yes. The experience on the team is top notch. Why? Because they have built a working system already. The system works on other blockchain networks as well. There really isn't much to say. Cardano is home to the hard worker. This team looks like one that works hard.
f6_assessments.q2: Yes. Given that they are working in the open, nothing hidden. They have given sufficient information that allows the audit the progress of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposed solution is to create an open and inclusive competitive environment - the concept of Decentralized Venture Capital. it is a great proposition as it will assist retail investors to get more favorable token allocation, seed price and other exclusive benefits which are usually extended to venture capitalists . it fits this proposal
f6_assessments.q1: The group is already established and has investment related experience. Financial budget is clearly and logically allocated to establish deliverable steps through a clear roadmap with milestones.
f6_assessments.q2: Financial roadmaps and budgets include milestones and some of the work assignments will be fully audited. solutions are given to solve the problem effectively and feasible to make it a reality.

f6_assessments.q0: This is an awesome defi project that should be given all the support. a one stop shop open finance solutions platform. Am very convinced that the proposal has huge potential upscale defi adoption in cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The project's team taunted some years of experience in the space without much details about past works. However the level of details with plans to implement and deploy resources being requested and convinced that they can implement this project successfully in consideration of the mention of deploying similar projects in other Blockchains.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has provided relevant metrics and in addition to the roadmaps, the project can be sufficiently audited for its progress and success.

solution: Notre solution à DAOLaunch est de créer un environnement concurrentiel ouvert et inclusif - le concept de capital-risque décentralisé.
experience: L'équipe de DAOLaunch est impliquée dans la crypto depuis 2015 avec des connaissances approfondies en matière d'investissement, de développement, de marketing et de gestion.
